Turn review data into product improvements."}],["$","$La",null,{"content":"Amazon reviews are a goldmine of customer feedback. Manual reading does not work when you are analyzing hundreds or thousands of reviews across multiple products. Web scraping allows you to extract all reviews for any Amazon product and analyze them programmatically. Customer reviews contain actionable intelligence about product flaws, unexpected use cases, and feature requests."}],["$","div",null,{"className":"mt-12 pt-8 border-t border-slate-200","children":[["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-sm font-bold text-slate-500 uppercase tracking-wider mb-4","children":"Tags"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"flex flex-wrap gap-2","children":[["$","span","Amazon",{"className":"px-3 py-1 bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 text-sm rounded-full","children":"Amazon"}],["$","span","Review Analysis",{"className":"px-3 py-1 bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 text-sm rounded-full","children":"Review Analysis"}],["$","span","Web Scraping",{"className":"px-3 py-1 bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 text-sm rounded-full","children":"Web Scraping"}],["$","span","Product Research",{"className":"px-3 py-1 bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 text-sm rounded-full","children":"Product Research"}],["$","span","Data Analysis",{"className":"px-3 py-1 bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 text-sm rounded-full","children":"Data Analysis"}]]}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"mt-12 pt-8 border-t border-slate-200","children":["$","$Lb",null,{"href":"/blog","className":"inline-flex items-center gap-2 text-primary font-bold hover:gap-3 transition-all","children":[["$","svg",null,{"xmlns":"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg","className":"h-5 w-5","viewBox":"0 0 20 20","fill":"currentColor","children":["$","path",null,{"fillRule":"evenodd","d":"M9.707 16.707a1 1 0 01-1.414 0l-6-6a1 1 0 010-1.414l6-6a1 1 0 011.414 1.414L5.414 9H17a1 1 0 110 2H5.414l4.293 4.293a1 1 0 010 1.414z","clipRule":"evenodd"}]}],"Back to Blog"]}]}]]}]]}]]
